languages.text: "Помните, я рассказывал о миссии, на которой лишился руки? Эммерсон продался преступному синдикату и скомпрометировал тот рейд".
"Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."
languages.original_text: "Помните, я рассказывал о миссии, на которой лишился руки? Эммерсон продался преступному синдикату и скомпрометировал тот рейд".

traits.locale_text: "Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."
"Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."
"Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."
"Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."
"Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."
"Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."

languages.text: 「以前話したあの任務を覚えていますか？私が腕を失った作戦です。あの時、私たちを犯罪シンジケートに売り、襲撃作戦を台無しにした張本人がエマーソンだったんです」
languages.original_text: "Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."

traits.locale_text: 「以前話したあの任務を覚えていますか？私が腕を失った作戦です。あの時、私たちを犯罪シンジケートに売り、襲撃作戦を台無しにした張本人がエマーソンだったんです」

languages.text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch an die Mission, von der ich erzählt habe, bei der ich meinen Arm verloren habe? Es war Emmerson, der uns an das Verbrechersyndikat verkauft und damit den Angriff zum Scheitern verurteilt hat."
languages.original_text: "Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."

traits.locale_text: "Erinnert Ihr Euch an die Mission, von der ich erzählt habe, bei der ich meinen Arm verloren habe? Es war Emmerson, der uns an das Verbrechersyndikat verkauft und damit den Angriff zum Scheitern verurteilt hat."

languages.text: « Vous vous souvenez de la mission dont je vous ai parlé, celle qui m'a coûté mon bras ? C'est Emmerson qui nous a vendus à un syndicat criminel, compromettant ainsi notre mission. »
languages.original_text: "Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."

traits.locale_text: « Vous vous souvenez de la mission dont je vous ai parlé, celle qui m'a coûté mon bras ? C'est Emmerson qui nous a vendus à un syndicat criminel, compromettant ainsi notre mission. »

languages.text: «¿Se acuerda de esa misión de la que le hablé, la que me costó el brazo? Fue Emmerson quien nos vendió al sindicato del crimen y puso en peligro la redada».
languages.original_text: "Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."

traits.locale_text: «¿Se acuerda de esa misión de la que le hablé, la que me costó el brazo? Fue Emmerson quien nos vendió al sindicato del crimen y puso en peligro la redada».

languages.text: “还记得我之前和你说过的那次行动吗？害得我失去了胳膊的那次行动？就是艾莫森把我们的情报卖给了犯罪集团，导致行动失败。”
languages.original_text: "Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."

traits.locale_text: “还记得我之前和你说过的那次行动吗？害得我失去了胳膊的那次行动？就是艾莫森把我们的情报卖给了犯罪集团，导致行动失败。”

languages.text: "Size bir görevden bahsetmiştim. Hatırlıyor musunuz? Kolumu kaybettiğim o görev. Bizi suç şebekesine satan ve baskını tehlikeye atan Emmerson'dı."
languages.original_text: "Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."

traits.locale_text: "Size bir görevden bahsetmiştim. Hatırlıyor musunuz? Kolumu kaybettiğim o görev. Bizi suç şebekesine satan ve baskını tehlikeye atan kişi Emmerson'dı."

languages.original_text: "Remember that mission I told you about, the one that cost me my arm? It was Emmerson who sold us out to the crime syndicate and compromised the raid."
